attributes.action: reinstate full stroke rehabilitation in the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a purpose built stroke unit at Ipswich hospital that has been closed.This week a further ward closure means there is now only one ward in east suffolk where any rehab is offerred. Leaving a young stroke victim who have been assessed as requiring 3 months specialist residential rehab in an out of county facility [funding refused] in the position of imminant discharge home to sleep in his dining dining room use a commode for toilet purposes and no facilities for showering or bathing. Care in the community might be four times a day if we are lucky so any fall would leave this hemiplegic young man on the floor until a carer returns. The weekend provision would obviously be less. physio non existant and life not worth living.
